shortdesc.i: The PushPayload object provides access to the payload that has arrived as the result of a push. This object cannot be created by the new keyword. It is generated only by the system on receipt of a push notification.

conbody.p: {Sample - Push Capture} https://github.com/blackberry/BB10-WebWorks-Samples/tree/master/pushCapture Sample that demonstrates how to use the BlackBerry Push API [BlackBerry on GitHub]. {Developer Guide} https://developer.blackberry.com/html5/documentation/push_service.html Guide for creating a Push Capture sample app [BlackBerry Developer Documentation].
